description: GDG Porto DevFest 2020 celebrating International Women's Day

featuredSessions.description: GDG DevFest Porto brings together the world class experts in Android, Web and Cloud technologies to Porto for a day of sessions, workshops and showcases.
featuredSessions.label: See last year speakers

howItWas.description: Our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere. People said "That was great. Never imagined to learn from a drug dealer, a guy that don't use passwords or a even from a girl that query APIs. Excellent job. See you in the next year "
howItWas.label: See how it was last year

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks and lunch. The tickets value will be donated to a charitable organization after the event. If you need an invoice, we will provide them only after the event as it will be a donation receipt issued by the chosen charitable organization.

galleryBlock.title: #DevFestPorto highlights
galleryBlock.description: Last year's festival built lots of excitement. Check out photos from featured talks, hands-on learning sessions, and after-hours fun.

team.description:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Porto](https://gdgporto.xyz) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Porto audience to boost development of IT.

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime

blocks.title: Organizer
blocks.description: GDG Porto is proud organizer of DevFest Porto with support of Women Techmakers

blocks.title: What is a GDG?
blocks.description: A Google Developer Group is a community of volunteers who create exciting projects and share experiences about Google technologies.

blocks.title: What is DevFest?
blocks.description: DevFests are community-led developer events hosted by Google Developer Groups around the globe.
